level.heading: SOLICITATIONS FOR INFORMATION AND PLANNING PURPOSES (ยง 30-2303)

level.text: When information necessary for planning purposes cannot be obtained from prospective offerors by more economical and less formal means, the contracting officer may determine in writing that a solicitation for information and planning purposes is justified. If this determination is approved by the Director of Procurement, the contracting officer shall then issue the solicitation.
A contracting officer shall not use a formal RFP as a solicitation for information or planning purposes.
